deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Seller and buyer are not the same, they have different accounts and do not share the same one. We are writing this error message to let you know that the buyer and the seller are not the same. Perhaps you made a typo or you are just trying to be very descriptive. Please try again with a shorter string for reason."
